data.message:
George Michael–( Saddens Fans With–AIDS Suicide–Murder Accusations )
Anderson Cooper #CIA quote–December 25, 2016 – yes George Michael contacted me several times. We are very close friends since he became famous. Yes, he told me his life was being threatened because he wanted expose child molesters and Ellen ,Jane Lynch , Elton John ,Stephen Fry, threatened to murder him even though he was dying of AIDS, and had spread it too many children and others_ he knew there was no forgiveness for him. he told me he was sending me the names . And he said all the LG BT celebrities in Europe are involved in Eurovision, child molestation's with Ashley Madison Corporation. I'm not involved. George told me many stories, but I didn't receive the list of names. I don't want this to get out on the news unless I have the list of names to back it up.without the names. No one will believe the story and will think I'm selling out. LGBT to save my mother's money in Judgment Day court.the White House was already informed me Judgment Day court is going to be happening very soon. All the celebrities know. And they're panicking. I'm not molesting children. I'm definitely not on the list.apparently Cara dev. and Amanda heard visited him with threats as well Directly from Satan herself, Ellen. Apparently Justin Bieber took calls from George and knows the entire story.but he's afraid to be murdered as well. everyone has or saw the list of names is afraid to be murdered by Ellen and Jane Lynch and Elton John, friends and the NSA underground. They are extremely powerful. I'm not a member. And they should be afraid, very afraid. Very, very afraid to show those names.
_ #Elton John CIA quote December 26, 2016 – my friends and I were not poisoning George Michael. We did not pay anyone to slowly poison him in the last week of his life. The maid is lying.they all lie because they're stealing things from the house. And they always blame me for stealing things for witchcraft voodoo rituals.everyone here works for me. I think You Should watch what you imply.
#GeorgeMichael #Elton #George #VisitDubai.
